nodes.text: OM 5 was a B1-series battle droid used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. During the Battle of Ryloth, OM 5 and OM 7 were sent by their commander to check out a Republic gunship that was blocking their path. OM 5 and OM 7 pulled the door open the gunship only to discover it was full of explosives. A clone trooper of the Outer Rim garrison hidden in the nearby hill triggered an explosion that sealed the mountain pass, destroying OM 5 and OM 7.
